body:
- Provide file list and md5 hashes for 3.8.1 and 3.9.0.
- Clean up indentation for the 'releases' data structure to improve consistency.

LLVM has a complicated recipe and I'm not an expert on building it.  The changes in this PR worked for me, but I would like a second opinion before they are merged.
title: Provide newer versions of llvm (3.8.1, 3.9.0)
